dt: {bc}a prose narrative recorded in Iceland in the 12th and 13th centuries of historic or legendary figures and events of the heroic age of Norway and Iceland
{bc}a modern heroic narrative resembling the Icelandic saga
{bc}a dramatic and often complicated story or series of events

dt.t: For many people, the process caps an already lengthy immigration {wi}saga{/wi} …
A federal appeals court hears arguments Tuesday in the legal {wi}saga{/wi} of two film producers fighting long prison terms and prosecutions …

shortdef: a prose narrative recorded in Iceland in the 12th and 13th centuries of historic or legendary figures and events of the heroic age of Norway and Iceland
a modern heroic narrative resembling the Icelandic saga
a long detailed account; also : a dramatic and often complicated story or series of events
